generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the main surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible on the right side of the road, standing on a designated pedestrian area, which is separated from the road by a curb and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black sedan, a red van, and a light blue car.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
